subject: Football
Uniforms
Laundry and Laundromats
lead_paragraph: The game-day uniforms of the Giants, the Jets and the Eagles owe their brightness to Barry Barone of Park Cleaners in Rutherford, N.J.
snippet: The game-day uniforms of the Giants, the Jets and the Eagles owe their brightness to Barry Barone of Park Cleaners in Rutherford, N.J.
